parts.name: Eyepiece Lens
parts.description: The lens at the top that you look through. They are usually 10x or 15x power.

parts.name: Tube
parts.description: Connects the eyepiece to the objective lenses.

parts.name: Arm
parts.description: Supports the tube and connects it to the base.

parts.name: Base
parts.description: The bottom of the microscope, used for support.

parts.name: Illuminator
parts.description: A steady light source that shines up through the slide.

parts.name: Stage
parts.description: The flat platform where you place your slides.

parts.name: Coarse Adjustment Knob
parts.description: Moves the stage up and down for focusing.

parts.name: Fine Adjustment Knob
parts.description: Small, round knob on the side of the microscope used to fine-tune the focus of the specimen.
